title: LFT - Platinum 4 top/jungler looking for a serious/competitive team
body: Hi guys, currently platinum 4 as a top/jungle main, still climbing pretty easily. Consistently outjungle/outlane diamond players. Looking for a serious team to enter online tournaments and maybe get high up on the open ladder. I don't rage and will happily listen to your shotcalling/adjust for meta picks and just wanna improve both me and the team. Add me in game and let's have a yarn.

replies.body: Sup dude add me in game- we played a bit last year :)
